Articles.Content:
Lets share, this is my baby 31t 5 rovers:

one 4 man crew rover with fuel transfer docks

two survey drones with glider design to save on fuel for planets with atmosphere (refuel dock included)

two low gravity 1 man Vtol (also with refuel docks on 3 sides)

craft file requires bahumoto dynamics, space plane +, mech jeb
